code: import React from"react";import"./BookingList.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookingList=_ref=>{let{bookings,onDelete}=_ref;const handleDelete=id=>{onDelete(id);};if(bookings.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"no-bookings-message",children:"No bookings available."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"bookings-list-wrapper",children:bookings.map(_ref2=>{let{_id,event,createdAt}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"bookings-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bookings-item-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Title: ",event.title]})," - ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Date: ",new Date(createdAt).toLocaleString()]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bookings-item-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:()=>handleDelete(_id),children:"Cancel Booking"})})]},_id);})});};export default BookingList;
